plot: A young, innocent girl is raped by her step father. She attempts to kill herself but is later saved by a Buddhist monk. She embarks on a journey with him and soon discovers the meaning of life.
title: Duong tran
plot_es: A young, innocent girl is raped by her step father. She attempts to kill herself but is later saved by a Buddhist monk. She embarks on a journey with him and soon discovers the meaning of life.
